attributes.action: Withdraw the ideas of wearing masks in the public places across all UK.
attributes.additional_details:
The COVID-19 disease causing coronavirus can enter the body through the eyes.

The eyes are connected to the nose with tear ducts, so infected tears can reach the nose, and the nose (and mouth) is the gate of infection for COVID-19. this way, the virus enters the lungs, where it primarily causes an infection. Therefore, we should absolutely avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth and often wash or sanitize your hands.

Masks don't protect us from infection !!!
attributes.background: Change the idea about wear masks in all public places across all UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331174
